newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Bank of East Asia forms China property JV.
newsitem.headline: Bank of East Asia forms China property JV.

text.p: A Bank of East Asia unit East Asia Property Agency (China) and real estate consultancy Marlin Land on Wednesday said they have formed a joint venture, East Asia Marlin Land, to develop property business in China.
The new company would service the property requirements of corporate clients in China, covering office, industrial, retail and residential needs, they said in a statement.
The venture would combine property expertise with banking, financial and corporate advisory services, it said.
